fixes.name: Market Subtype
fixes.dax_expression:
VAR Subtype = 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[MARKET_SUBTYPE]
VAR Title = 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Market Title]
VAR MarketType = 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[MARKET_TYPE]
RETURN
IF(
    ISBLANK(Subtype),
    SWITCH(
        TRUE(),
        CONTAINSSTRING(Title, "Major"), "Major Curve",
        CONTAINSSTRING(Title, "CCIRS"), "CCIRS Basis",
        CONTAINSSTRING(Title, "1m"), "1m Basis",
        CONTAINSSTRING(Title, "3m"), "3m Basis",
        CONTAINSSTRING(Title, "6m"), "6m Basis",
        CONTAINSSTRING(Title, "12m"), "12m Basis",
        CONTAINSSTRING(Title, "Vol"), MID(Title, 5, LEN(Title) - 4),
        MarketType
    ),
    Subtype
)
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted row-level Tableau logic to a DAX calculated column. ISNULL(...) -> ISBLANK(...). CONTAINS(...) -> CONTAINSSTRING(...). Nested IF/ELSEIF chain translated to SWITCH(TRUE(), ...) for readability. The MID([Market Title],5) is implemented as MID(Title, 5, LEN(Title) - 4) to return the substring from the 5th character to the end. References converted to 'Table'[Column] format and fallback to MARKET_TYPE preserved.
